item.title: SIRs
item.description: A SIR(Susceptible, Infectious or Removed) model is a compartmental model in epidemiology. I am no epidemiologist, however at the start of the pandemic I wrote a very basic simmulaiton of the SIR model in javascript with some nice graphics to go along with it. You can play around with it here. //TODO: Put the sim here //TODO: Put some insights here, need to watch the sim again to do that tho
